name: Emergency Relief Program Outreach Education and Technical Assistance
objective: The Emergency Relief Program (ERP) is intended to help agricultural producers offset the impacts of natural disasters in 2020 and 2021. The second phase of ERP is aimed at filling gaps and providing assistance to producers who did not participate in or receive payments through the existing risk management programs that were leveraged for phase 1 implementation.
applicant_types: Native American Organizations (includes Indian groups, cooperatives, corporations, partnerships, associations)

authorizations.text: Extending Government Funding and Delivering Emergency Assistance Act, Title 1, Pub. L. 117-43.
